summary: Tweaks some naming for creatures, ingredients, and misc objects; differentiates most apparrel to reduce repeated lines of the same name in inventory.
descriptionHtml:
This mod does some minor changing of names for critters, ingredients, clothing and basic armors, and miscellaneous objects -- in some cases to improve immersion/consistency and in other cases to reduce the number of different objects with the same name.

[b][color=#6fa8dc][u]__Details[/u]_________________________________[/color]

[color=#ff0000]UPDATE 12/27/2014 (18 hours after release) - v1.1[/color][/b]

     --Dragonflies are now Orange Dartwings or Blue Dartwings
     --Monarch Butterfly is now Striped Butterfly
     --Butterfly Wing is now Striped Butterfly Wing
     --Jade Circlets are now Orichalcum Circlets
     --Copper Circlets are now Corundum Circlets
     --Circlet with Onyx now says Ebony instead
     --Mountain Flowers are differentiated by color when harvesting
     --Roll of Paper is now Paper Roll
     --The writing Charcoal is now Charcoal Stick
     --Hawks' Nest, Chickens' Nest, Birds' Nest have all been specified
     --Fish Barrels are now regular Barrels
     --Hawk's Egg is now Hawk Egg
     --Baskets have been differentiated by type
     --Plates, Bowls, Cups, Goblets, Dwemer dishes/silverware, Jugs, and Pots have been differentiated by type
     --Buckets, Candlesticks, Embalming Tools, Cast Iron Pots, Shovels, Empty Wine Bottles, and Urns have been differentiated by type
     --Most simple clothing, Boots, Shoes, Robes, Hats, etc. have been differentiated by type and occasionally by character
     --Fur Armor and Steel Armor have been differentiated by style
     --Dawnguard and Vampire Armors have been differentiated by color
     --Nordic Shield is now Nordic Carved Shield
     --Dragonplate Armor/Gauntlets/Shield worn by the Keepers (Dawnguard) is now Keeper's Armor/Gauntlets/Shield

[b][color=#f1c232]v1.1 includes .ods spreadsheet of all name changes.[/color][/b]

[b][b][color=#6fa8dc][u]__Change Log[/u][b]___________________________[/b][/color][/b]

v1.1 - [/b]Cleaned up plugin, tweaked a few things that weren't consistent (added to description above), added spreadsheet of all changes in the mod.

[b][color=#6fa8dc][u]__Notes[/u][b]________________________________[/b][/color][/b]

A few tweaked items are Dawnguard and Dragonborn, but I don't think it should hurt anything if you just have the vanilla game.

[b][color=#6fa8dc][u]__Plans for Future[/u][b]________________________[/b][/color][/b]

     --Standardize book/note titles
     --Non-immersive version for quick sorting
     --Sweep for errors in what's already done

[b][color=#6fa8dc][u]__Install[/u][b]________________________________[/b][/color][/b]

Download and extract .esp file. Add it to your Skyrim -> Data folder. When you start the game, be sure to enable the mod under Data Files before loading.

[b][color=#6fa8dc][u]__Uninstall[/u][b]______________________________[/b][/color][/b]

Remove .esp file from your Skyrim -> Data folder.

[b][color=#6fa8dc]__[u]Compatibility[/u][b]___________________________[/b][/color][/b]

This may conflict with other mods that alter any of the objects I've renamed. I didn't worry much about that when making it as it was initially for personal use.

It may conflict in terms of immersion with other existing mods that have converted corundum to copper (the opposite of what I did).

[b][color=#6fa8dc]__[u]Bugs[/u][b]__________________________________[/b][/color][/b]

A few items are still listing twice, because they're two different ref ID's with identical stats and mesh. Later I may go in and merge them.

[b][color=#6fa8dc]__[u]Resources Used[/u][b]__________________________[/b][/color]
[/b]
None.

[b][color=#6fa8dc]__[u]History[/u][b]________________________________[/b][/color][/b]

     --Initial release - 12/27/2014 (approx. 4am)
     --v1.1 - 12/27/2014 (approx. 11pm)
author: MadModderJess
